title: Bets.io_Nikita
author: Bets.io_Nikita
created_time: October 24, 2023, 08:50:41 PMLast edit: October 25, 2023, 04:17:20 PM by Bets.io_Nikita
content: Hey there!Hope everyone is doing well!I'm Nikita — the community manager of Bets.io. And since "third time's the charm", this is our new (and the one and only) thread about our casino.I know that we already are pretty (in)famous here for a couple of reasons, but we'll make sure to answer any of your questions in this thread. With the admins' blessings, of course _____________________________We are Bets.io — the Rising Star Operator (according to SiGMA 2022), who offers payment in over 510 different crypto coins, as well as an extensive list of networks, ensuring that you have the flexibility and convenience you need to play the way you want.In addition to a user-friendly interface and easy navigation, Bets.io provides complete client confidentiality, as well as an impressive bonus package that includes a first deposit bonus, welcome bonus, cashback bonus, free spins, and more.So whether you're a seasoned player or just getting started, we have everything you need to take your gaming to the next level. Sign up today to experience what we have to offer.And some obligatory bullet points — we've got:•   More than 10 000 games (including wide range of live games)•   Deposits from $15•   Lightning fast withdrawals from €5 •   510+ coins with extensive list of networks and P2P fiat exchange•   Loyal betting limits – up to 100 000 USDT•   24/7 support and recovery of lost deposits over 50 USDT•   Lots of bonuses and promotions: cashback every day, Weekend reload bonus, first deposit bonus, mystery boxes and many more!•   Full confidentiality•   User-friendly interface and easy navigation•   VIP managers who can help solve any problem, provide training, issue personal bonuses and giftsWishing you all good luck, and see you at Bets.io!

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: First, welcome to the forum.Since this is going to be your one and only announcement thread on the forum, I will advise you to make it very detailed so that people can get information that they need about you from here without stress or going to Google to do some searching.You can start by getting a  Copper member account , which will enable you to add some images to your announcement thread. You may also hire a graphic designer if you don't have one that can give your work a good look.You said you are famous around here, but I guess this is just the first time I have come across the name “Bets.io”

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Hello Nikita, I welcome you to this amazing forum and it's nice to see someone from Bets.io taking initiative of having their presence on this forum. I highly recommend you to purchase cooper membership so you can make a better announcement thread and add some picture and graphics into it. The text based ann threads aren't much attractive and that's why I recommend you to go for cooper membership and improve the ann thread by adding pictures and graphics into it.I also recommend you to run a signature campaign as that will allow you to get Bets.io to reach more audience. I must say that Bets.io is a quite good domain name and with a signature campaign you'll get many new players on your site. Once again I welcome you to the forum and I also recommend you to run a review campaign if you want to have some feedback about your platform.

comments.author: Quidat
comments.body: Welcome to this forum Bets.io!No need to repeat on suggestions above on which if you are running a business and make out some introduction here on this forum or community then it would really be that just recommendable on making your ANN thread look fancy and something appealing.Therefore coppermembership would really be relevant.In regarding on the site then it isnt bad looking too, you would really be just needing to have some exposure here on this forum or market so that you would really be gettingat least that recognition.Good luck! Gambling business competition into this market is really that vast and tough! Hope you would really be active and could be able to survive.Im not really that making some discouragement but rather making some real talks on here.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Welcome mate,  good to have you around and hope to see the best from this project,  it's always an exciting thing to see a new casino popping up here in the forum because this shows that the market is indeed growing and increasing by days and that is what we all want to build a competitive gambling market,  because that is the only way to build competions within the various casinos and also being able to set up conduct the gambling environment for gamblers. But then for you to do well in your publication,  you have to get a Copper member account so that you will be able to post images.

comments.author: Bets.io_Nikita
comments.body: Already on it, just waiting for the transaction completionTaking a bit more time than I though, tbhQuote from: Nwada001 on October 24, 2023, 08:54:06 PMYou said you are famous around hereWe've had a few threads in the last two years, which were spammed and flooded to oblivion. That's why we are starting anew As for the info on our platform — will post more as soon as my membership goes through!

comments.body: Quote from: Bets.io_Nikita on October 24, 2023, 08:50:41 PMHey there!Hope everyone is doing well!I'm Nikita — the community manager of Bets.io. And since "third time's the charm", this is our new (and the one and only) thread about our casino.I know that we already are pretty (in)famous here for a couple of reasons, but we'll make sure to answer any of your questions in this thread. With the admins' blessings, of course That domain name sure make an outstanding sound and easy to remember but I'm sorry if you're not known to me, might be you've had not been the extravagant marketer in this forum. I think it would have been nice since you're starting from scratch to include all the necessary information of your casino in this very thread rather than making another one.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Bets.io_Nikita on October 24, 2023, 09:18:48 PMAlready on it, just waiting for the transaction completionTaking a bit more time than I though, tbhQuote from: Nwada001 on October 24, 2023, 08:54:06 PMYou said you are famous around hereWe've had a few threads in the last two years, which were spammed and flooded to oblivion. That's why we are starting anew As for the info on our platform — will post more as soon as my membership goes through!You welcome to the forum and I hope you will be serious this time to get to business since you said you were here two years ago and your thread got spammed into oblivion. That means you probably didn't have much going on there and it was natural for it to be forgotten.As always, the forum is a very competitive environment for casinos and you have to get on that competition if you want to survive. You need to be financially ready also and open up a signature campaign so that your awareness will sink into the forum. It is an environment for serious casinos and if you check the service board you will see many casinos running on signature campaign to push in their presence more. Good luck this time.

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Welcome Bets.ioThis domain sounds popular and I don't know where if I have seen this domain around the forum before. It could be that you got a cool and catchy domain name. I have also seen that you have followed the recommendation of the forum users to get a copper membership status. The image in OP is now visible.If you are actually here to advertise your casino. There are some managers who can help you plan out how to give you a good advertisement with any budget you have. You can contact CryptopreneurBrainboss  or Royse777. Welcome once again

comments.author: Bets.io_Nikita
comments.body: Thanks everyone for the warm welcome!And since we can now post pictures, we don't we start off this thread with a bangWe are talking about one of our giveaways. And, to be more precise, you are all welcome to...In October we’re going bigger: 5 iPhones 15 Pro 256 GB and 25 $200 cash bonuses for our lucky winners. Hope you are as excited as we are We’ve made the entry easier, too! All you have to do is:1. Sign up at Bets.io2. Subscribe to our Telegram channel 3. While you are at it, subscribe to our Instagram and Twitter4. Send our Telegram bot a message and follow the instructions5. Wait till 31st of October ⌚Aaaand that’s pretty much it!A bit of usual rules as a side note: the money will be credited to your Bets.io account, no double entry, only legit accounts and if we can’t send you the iPhone, we’ll provide its cash equivalent. You know what they say, fortune favors the bold — so good luck, have fun and see you at Bets.io!

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: We are glad to have you here on the forum platform with a casino that you would like to share with us. As mentioned by those who previously posted here in the announcement you made, do the correct procedure and show us here the complete Bets.io that you mentioned.I hope that in the future you will be like other casinos that can establish a lot of community gamblers who will support your casino, and I hope that the offers and promotions that you will offer to our gamblers will also be good.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: I knew the name and the logo were familiar, you have posted an ANN thread before, welcome back to the forum! Quote from: Bets.io_Nikita on October 24, 2023, 09:18:48 PMAlready on it, just waiting for the transaction completionTaking a bit more time than I though, tbhQuote from: Nwada001 on October 24, 2023, 08:54:06 PMYou said you are famous around hereWe've had a few threads in the last two years, which were spammed and flooded to oblivion. comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Welcome aboard. I guess you should fix your OP and even the subject as well. There are lots of thread about your casino but most of them are affiliates only so it's better make it like this way.
